trans-unit.source: Encapsulates all HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler alle HTTP-spesifikk informasjon om en individuell HTTP-forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule> and <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interfaces are provided a reference to an HttpContext object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver den <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>og <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>grensesnitt er angitt en referanse til et objekt som HttpContext for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> </xref:System.Web.IHttpModule>

trans-unit.source: The object provides access to the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A> properties for the request.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som gir tilgang til den innebygde <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>Egenskaper for forespørselen.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of errors accumulated while processing an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter en rekke feil akkumulert under behandling av en HTTP-forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Exception> objects for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref:System.Exception>objekter for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om asynkrone operasjoner er tillatt under deler av ASP.NET forespørselen behandling når de ikke er forventet.

trans-unit.source: If this flag is not set to `true`, ASP.NET will throw an exception when it detects the application misusing the async API.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette flagget ikke er satt til `true`, ASP.NET Iverksett et unntak når programmet misbruke asynkron API oppdages.

trans-unit.source: This can occur if you try to call an asynchronous method during a part of the request processing pipeline where asynchronous operations are not expected, or if there is still outstanding asynchronous work when an asynchronous module or handler signals completion.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje hvis du prøver å kalle en asynkron metoden under en del av forespørselen som behandler pipelinen der forventes ikke asynkrone operasjoner, eller hvis det fremdeles utestående asynkrone arbeidet når en asynkron modul eller et behandlingsprogram signaliserer er fullført.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is meant as a safety net to let you know early on if you're writing async code that doesn't fit expected patterns and might have negative side effects.
trans-unit.target: Dette er ment som et sikkerhetsnett la deg få vite tidlig på Hvis du skriver asynkron koden som ikke passer forventet mønstre og kan ha negative bivirkninger.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Hvis ASP.NET Iverksett et unntak under asynkron API er brukt på et tidspunkt da den ikke er forventet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> object for the current HTTP request, use <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ApplicationInstance*>.
trans-unit.target: Å hente den <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler, bruker du <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ApplicationInstance*>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ApplicationInstance*>

trans-unit.source: (ASP.NET uses <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplicationInstance" name="ApplicationInstance" href=""></xref> instead of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""></xref> as a property name to refer to the current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance in order to avoid confusion between ASP.NET and classic ASP.
trans-unit.target: (ASP.NET bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplicationInstance" name="ApplicationInstance" href=""> </xref> i stedet for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""> </xref> som et egenskapsnavn til å henvise til gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> forekomsten for å unngå forvirring mellom ASP.NET og klassisk ASP.

trans-unit.source: In classic ASP, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""></xref> refers to the global application state dictionary.)
trans-unit.target: I klassisk ASP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""> </xref> refererer til den globale tilstand ordlisten.)

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplicationInstance" name="ApplicationInstance" href=""></xref> instead of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""></xref> as a property name to refer to the current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance in order to avoid confusion between ASP.NET and classic ASP.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplicationInstance" name="ApplicationInstance" href=""> </xref> i stedet for <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""> </xref> som et egenskapsnavn referere til gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> forekomsten for å unngå forvirring mellom ASP.NET og klassisk ASP.

trans-unit.source: In classic ASP, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""></xref> refers to the global application state dictionary.
trans-unit.target: I klassisk ASP <xref uid="langword_csharp_Application" name="Application" href=""> </xref> refererer til den globale tilstand ordlisten.

trans-unit.source: The Web application is running under IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode, and an attempt was made to change the property value from a non-null value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Webprogrammet kjører under IIS 7.0 i integrert modus, og forsøk på å endre egenskapsverdien fra en ikke-null-verdi til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som inneholder flagg som gjelder for asynkron preload modus.

trans-unit.source: The first time this property is accessed, the object that contains flags for asynchronous preload mode is loaded from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.AsyncPreloadMode%2A> setting in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Første gang denne egenskapen er åpnet, objektet som inneholder flagg for asynkron preload modus er lastet inn fra den <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.AsyncPreloadMode%2A>innstillingen i konfigurasjonsfilen.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.AsyncPreloadMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although this property can be set programmatically, changing the property value only has effect if the property is set before the `ExecuteRequestHandler` step in the ASP.NET request pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Selv om denne egenskapen kan angis et program, endre egenskapsverdien har bare innvirkning hvis egenskapen angis før den `ExecuteRequestHandler` trinn i forespørselsforløpet ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder flagg som gjelder for asynkron preload modus.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Caching.Cache"></xref> object for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.Caching.Cache"> </xref> for gjeldende programdomenet objekter.

trans-unit.source: There is one instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> class per application domain.
trans-unit.target: Det er en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>klassen per programdomenet.</xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> object that is returned by the Cache property is the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> object for all requests in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>objektet som er returnert av egenskapen hurtigbufferen er den <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>objekt for alle forespørsler i programdomenet.</xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> </xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Caching.Cache"></xref> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.Caching.Cache"> </xref> for gjeldende programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: Clears all errors for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle feil for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: This property is a static property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en statisk egenskap for <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>klassen.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The property stores the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance that applies to the current request.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen butikker i <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>-forekomst som gjelder for gjeldende forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The properties of this instance are the non-static properties of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene for denne forekomsten er ikke statisk egenskaper for <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>klassen.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to access the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å få tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> forekomsten for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> object that represents the currently executing handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> objektet som representerer i øyeblikket kjøres behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: The currently executing handler that is referenced by the CurrentHandler property might be different than the handler that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For øyeblikket kjøres behandlingsprogrammet som det refereres til av egenskapen CurrentHandler kan være forskjellig fra behandlingsprogrammet som refererer til den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Handler%2A>

trans-unit.source: This can occur when another handler was requested by using the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje når en annen behandlingsprogrammet ble forespurt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>metoden eller <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the currently executing handler finishes processing, the previously determined handler is restored.
trans-unit.target: Når øyeblikket kjøres behandlingsprogrammet er fullført, gjenopprettes tidligere fastslått behandlingsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> that represents the currently executing handler.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> som representerer i øyeblikket kjøres behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.RequestNotification"></xref> value that indicates the current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> event that is processing.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.RequestNotification"> </xref> verdi som angir gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> hendelsen behandles.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentNotification property requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CurrentNotification krever integrert pipeline-modus i [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] og minst .NET Framework, versjon 3.0.

trans-unit.source: When available, the property returns a <xref:System.Web.RequestNotification> value.
trans-unit.target: Når den er tilgjengelig, returneres det en <xref:System.Web.RequestNotification>verdi.</xref:System.Web.RequestNotification>

trans-unit.source: The value of the CurrentNotification property indicates which event in the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> instance is currently processing the request.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen CurrentNotification angir hvilke hendelser i den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>forekomsten er for øyeblikket behandling av forespørselen.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>

trans-unit.source: The CurrentNotification property is not intended to be set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CurrentNotification skal ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is set by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] during the processing of the request in the ASP.NET pipeline.
trans-unit.target: I stedet den er angitt av [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] under behandling av forespørselen i pipeline-ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentNotification property will result in a compilation error.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen CurrentNotification vil føre til en kompileringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: CurrentNotification is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CurrentNotification introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.RequestNotification"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.RequestNotification"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The operation requires integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen krever integrert pipeline-modus i [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] og minst .NET Framework, versjon 3.0.

trans-unit.source: Enables an object's <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> method to be called when the <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> connection part of this request is completed.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer et objekt <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>metoden kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"> </xref> tilkoblingen en del av denne forespørselen er fullført.</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method of the target object is called after both the HTTP part of the request and the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connection have ended.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>metoden for målobjektet kalles etter både HTTP delen av forespørselen og <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>har avsluttet tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> </xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object is not available for inspection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>objektet er ikke tilgjengelig for inspection.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The object whose <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*> method must be called when the <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> connection part of the request is completed.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>metoden må kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"> </xref> tilkoblingen en del av forespørselen er fullført.</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: The subscription token.
trans-unit.target: Abonnementet-token.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first error (if any) accumulated during HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: Henter den første feilen (Hvis noen) akkumulert under HTTP be om behandling.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Exception> for the current HTTP request/response process; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no errors were accumulated during the HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref:System.Exception>for gjeldende HTTP-forespørselen/svaret behandle; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen feil ble akkumulert under HTTP-forespørselsbehandling.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> object responsible for processing the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> objektet som er ansvarlig for behandling av HTTP-forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The Handler property contains a reference to the handler that processes the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen behandlingsprogrammet inneholder en referanse til et behandlingsprogram som behandler HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The handler can be specified by using the element, or by using a custom handler defined in user code.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingsprogrammet kan angis ved hjelp av elementet, eller ved å bruke en egendefinert behandlingsprogram som er definert i brukerkode.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handlers, see [HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandlingsprogrammer [oversikt over HTTP-moduler og HTTP-behandlingsprogrammer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The reference to the Handler property will remain the same even after the current page has been changed by a server-side method, such as the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Referansen til egenskapen behandlingsprogrammet vil være den samme selv etter gjeldende side er endret av en serversiden metode som den <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>metoden eller <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> responsible for processing the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> ansvarlig for behandling av HTTP-forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether custom errors are enabled for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om egendefinerte feilmeldinger er aktivert for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom errors are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om egendefinerte feilmeldinger er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current HTTP request is in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler er i feilsøkingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the request is in debug mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forespørselen er i feilsøkingsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that is the current processing point in the ASP.NET pipeline just after an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> event has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som er gjeldende behandling punktet i ASP.NET pipeline bare når en <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> hendelsen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The IsPostNotification property is only supported with the integrated mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsPostNotification støttes bare i integrert modus i [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] og minst .NET Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: When available, the property returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an event in the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Når den er tilgjengelig, returneres det en boolsk verdi som angir om en hendelse i den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>objektet er fullført.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>

trans-unit.source: The IsPostNotification property is not intended to be set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsPostNotification skal ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is provided by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to the ASP.NET runtime for each notification.
trans-unit.target: I stedet sendes fra [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for ASP.NET-kjøretid for hver melding.

trans-unit.source: Setting the IsPostNotification property will result in a compilation error.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen IsPostNotification vil føre til en kompileringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: In scenarios where multiple events of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object are handled by one event handler, you can use the IsPostNotification property in combination with the <xref:System.Web.RequestNotification> enumeration to precisely determine where in the application lifecycle the current request is.
trans-unit.target: I tilfeller der flere hendelser av <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>objektet behandles av én hendelsesbehandling, kan du bruke egenskapen IsPostNotification sammen med <xref:System.Web.RequestNotification>opplistingen til å fastsette nøyaktig der i applikasjonen levetid gjeldende be om er.</xref:System.Web.RequestNotification> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>

trans-unit.source: IsPostNotification is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: IsPostNotification introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if custom errors are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om egendefinerte feilmeldinger er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The operation requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen krever integrert pipeline-modus i [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] og minst .NET Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the request is an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> request.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om forespørselen er en <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"> </xref> forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if the request contains the initial <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> handshake and the `WebSocket` module of IIS is active.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `true` hvis forespørselen inneholder første <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>handshake og `WebSocket` modul for IIS er aktiv.</xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the request is an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forespørselen er en <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"> </xref> forespørsel; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilkoblingen oppgraderer fra en HTTP-tilkobling til en <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"> </xref> tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection is upgrading; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tilkoblingen oppgraderer; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a key/value collection that can be used to organize and share data between an <xref href="System.Web.IHttpModule"></xref> interface and an <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> interface during an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter en nøkkel/verdi-samling som kan brukes til å organisere og dele data mellom en <xref href="System.Web.IHttpModule"> </xref> grensesnittet og en <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> grensesnittet under en HTTP-forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> key/value collection that provides access to an individual value in the collection by a specified key.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>nøkkel/verdi-samlingen som gir tilgang til én enkelt verdi i samlingen av en angitt nøkkel.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til siden instrumentation tjenesteforekomsten for denne forespørselen.

trans-unit.target: Siden instrumentation tjenesteforekomsten for denne forespørselen.

trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> for behandlingsprogrammet overordnede objekter.

trans-unit.source: The PreviousHandler property corresponds to the last handler before the current request was executed.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PreviousHandler svarer til den siste behandlingsprogrammet før gjeldende forespørsel ble utført.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no previous handler was found.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> forekomsten eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen tidligere behandling ble funnet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase"></xref> object for the current user profile.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase"> </xref> for gjeldende brukerprofil objekter.

trans-unit.source: A Profile property is used for persistent storage of structured data using a type-safe API.
trans-unit.target: En profilegenskap brukes til vedvarende lager for strukturert data ved hjelp av en type sikker API.

trans-unit.source: When a Profile property is accessed but no value is present, an empty instance is returned; `null` is not returned.
trans-unit.target: Når en profilegenskap er tilgjengelig, men ingen verdi er angitt, returneres en tom forekomst. `null` returneres ikke.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase"></xref> if the application configuration file contains a definition for the profile's properties; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase"> </xref> Hvis programmets konfigurasjonsfil inneholder en definisjon for profilegenskaper; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to specify a handler for the request.
trans-unit.target: Lar deg angi et behandlingsprogram for forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir `handler` til `null`, standard brukes til å behandle forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi `handler` til en asynkron håndterer eller en synkron håndterer.

trans-unit.source: The handler must implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Behandlingsprogrammet må implementere den <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>

trans-unit.source: The object that should process the request.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal behandle forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The RemapHandler method was called after the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.MapRequestHandler"></xref> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemapHandler ble kalt etter den <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.MapRequestHandler"> </xref> oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The Request property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: Forespørselsegenskapen gir programmatisk tilgang til egenskaper og metoder for <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>klassen.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi ASP.NET-sider inneholder en standard referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområdet (som inneholder den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>klassen), kan du sjekke medlemmene i <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>et .aspx siden uten å bruke fullstendige klassereferansen til <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `Request.Browser` to get the capabilities of the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke `Request.Browser` å hente egenskapene til klientleseren.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil bruke medlemmene av <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>fra en ASP.NET bakenforliggende kode modul, må du inkludere en referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområde i modulen og en fullstendig kvalifisert referanse til både aktive forespørsel/svar-konteksten og klassen i <xref:System.Web>som du vil bruke.</xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel på en side med bakenforliggende kode du må angi det fullstendige navnet `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET will throw an exception if you try to use this property when the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> object is not available.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET Iverksett et unntak hvis du prøver å bruke denne egenskapen når den <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>objektet er ikke tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: For example, this would be true in the Application_Start method of the Global.asax file, or in a method that is called from the Application_Start method.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil for eksempel være true i metoden Application_Start for filen Global.asax eller i en metode som kalles fra Application_Start-metoden.

trans-unit.source: At that time no HTTP request has been created yet.
trans-unit.target: Da har ingen HTTP-forespørsler opprettet ennå.

trans-unit.source: The Response property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen svar gir programmatisk tilgang til egenskaper og metoder for <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>klassen.</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi ASP.NET-sider inneholder en standard referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområdet (som inneholder den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>klassen), kan du sjekke medlemmene i <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>et .aspx siden uten å bruke fullstendige klassereferansen til <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `Response.Write("some output")` to write output to an HTTP output stream.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke `Response.Write("some output")` til å skrive utdata til en dataflyt for HTTP-utdata.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil bruke medlemmene av <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>fra en ASP.NET bakenforliggende kode modul, må du inkludere en referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområde i modulen og en fullstendig kvalifisert referanse til aktive forespørsel/svar-konteksten og klassen i <xref:System.Web>som du vil bruke.</xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel på en side med bakenforliggende kode du må angi det fullstendige navnet `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`.

trans-unit.source: Rewrites the URL using the given path.
trans-unit.target: Skriver nytt URL-adressen ved hjelp av den angitte banen.

trans-unit.source: The RewritePath method redirects a request for a resource to a different path than the one that is indicated by the requested URL.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RewritePath omadresserer en forespørsel om en ressurs til en annen bane enn det som er angitt av den forespurte URLEN.

trans-unit.source: If you have to reset the virtual path so that requests from the client for server resources resolve correctly, use the overload of this method that takes the `rebaseClientPath` parameter and set the parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har til å tilbakestille den virtuelle banen slik at forespørsler fra klienten for serverressurser løse på riktig måte, Bruk overlasten for denne metoden som bruker den `rebaseClientPath` parameteren og parameteren `false`.

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen skrive er nyttig når du ønsker å omstrukturere sidene i webprogrammet, og du vil forsikre deg om at personer som har bokmerke gamle URL-adressene kan fremdeles bruke dem når du har flyttet sider.

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen skrive på nytt, kan du videresende gjennomsiktig forespørsler til plasseringen for nye siden.

trans-unit.source: If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere et område for å bruke URL-adressene som er mer brukervennlig og er optimalisert for nedenfor, er et mer robust alternativ å bruke ASP.NET ruting.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET ruting](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The internal rewrite path.
trans-unit.target: Intern Skriv-bane.

trans-unit.source: The path parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The path parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The path parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
trans-unit.target: Den path parameteren er ikke i den gjeldende program rotmappen.

trans-unit.source: Rewrites the URL using the given path and a Boolean value that specifies whether the virtual path for server resources is modified.
trans-unit.target: Skriver URL-adressen ved hjelp av den angitte banen og en boolsk verdi som angir om den virtuelle banen for serverressurser er endret på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The RewritePath method is called by the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method with the `rebaseClientPath` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RewritePath kalles av den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>metoden med den `rebaseClientPath` parameteren satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.RewritePath%28System.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `rebaseClientPath` parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: For å sikre at ikke endres den virtuelle banen brukes til å konstruere baner til ressurser, kan du angi den `rebaseClientPath` parameter `false`.

trans-unit.source: A common scenario in which you might want to set `rebaseClientPath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig scenario der du kanskje vil angi `rebaseClientPath` til `false` er når du trenger å skrive om URL-adressen, og du bruker tema og omadressering URL-adressen til en ressurs som er plassert i en annen mappe enn den forespurte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen skrive er nyttig når du ønsker å omstrukturere sidene i webprogrammet, og du vil forsikre deg om at personer som har bokmerke gamle URL-adressene kan fremdeles bruke dem når du har flyttet sider.

trans-unit.source: If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET ruting](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"></xref> object that provides methods used in processing Web requests.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"> </xref> objekt som inneholder metoder som brukes i behandling webforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The Server property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: Serveregenskapen gir programmatisk tilgang til egenskaper og metoder for <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>klassen.</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi ASP.NET-sider inneholder en standard referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområdet (som inneholder den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>klassen), kan du sjekke medlemmene i <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>et .aspx siden uten å bruke fullstendige klassereferansen til <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` to create an instance of a COM object on the server.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` til å opprette en forekomst av en COM-objektet på serveren.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil bruke medlemmene av <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>fra en ASP.NET bakenforliggende kode modul, må du inkludere en referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområde i modulen og en fullstendig kvalifisert referanse til både aktive forespørsel/svar-konteksten og klassen i <xref:System.Web>som du vil bruke.</xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel på en side med bakenforliggende kode du må angi det fullstendige navnet `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The Session property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen økten gir programmatisk tilgang til egenskaper og metoder for <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>klassen.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>

trans-unit.source: In order to use session state you have to enable it.
trans-unit.target: Du må aktivere den for å kunne bruke status for økten.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to enable session state, see **Configuring Session State** in [ASP.NET Session State Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se for informasjon om hvordan du aktiverer økttilstanden **konfigurere økttilstanden** i [ASP.NET økten tilstand oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to save values in session state, see [How to: Save Values in Session State](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du lagrer verdier i økten, kan du se [slik: lagre verdiene i økttilstanden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to read values from session state, see [How to: Read Values from Session State](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du lese verdier fra økten, kan du se [slik: lese verdier fra økttilstanden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"> </xref> objekt for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Sets the type of session state behavior that is required in order to support an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Angir økten tilstand virkemåten som kreves for å støtte en HTTP-forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET default implementation, an HTTP request handler indicates whether it requires session state by implementing the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState> interface or the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IReadOnlySessionState> interface.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Standard implementering, en HTTP-forespørselsbehandling angir du om den krever at økttilstand ved å implementere den <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState>grensesnittet eller <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IReadOnlySessionState>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.IReadOnlySessionState> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState>

trans-unit.source: The SetSessionStateBehavior method and the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior> enumeration let you provide more detail about what type of session state support is required in order to handle a request.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetSessionStateBehavior og <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior>opplisting kan du angi flere detaljer om hva slags økten støtte kreves for å behandle en forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior>opplisting.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateBehavior>

trans-unit.source: The SetSessionStateBehavior method must be called before the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState> pipeline event.
trans-unit.target: SetSessionStateBehavior-metoden må kalles før den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState>pipeline-hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState>

trans-unit.source: Calls that occur during or after this event will cause an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Kall som genereres under eller etter at denne hendelsen vil føre til at en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>unntak.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies what type of session state behavior is required.
trans-unit.target: Opplisting verdier som angir hvilken type økten tilstand virkemåte kreves.

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState"></xref> event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ble kalt etter den <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState"> </xref> hendelsen oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule"></xref> object should skip the authorization check for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule"> </xref> objektet skal Hopp over godkjenning-kontroll for gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The SkipAuthorization property is intended for advanced use by authentication modules that need to redirect to a page that allows anonymous connections.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SkipAuthorization er ment for avansert bruk av godkjenningsmoduler som skal omadressere til en side der anonyme tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: The Forms authentication module and Passport authentication module both set SkipAuthorization when redirecting to a configured logon page.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaer godkjenning modulen og Passport godkjenning modulen angis begge SkipAuthorization når omadressere til en konfigurert påloggingsside.

trans-unit.source: Setting SkipAuthorization requires the `ControlPrincipal` flag to be set.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av SkipAuthorization krever den `ControlPrincipal` flagg må være angitt.

trans-unit.source: For information about the `ControlPrincipal` flag, see <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om den `ControlPrincipal` flagget, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule"></xref> should skip the authorization check; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule"> </xref> skal Hopp over godkjenning se; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object for the current service type.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt for gjeldende tjenestetypen.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to gain access to the underlying <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig for å få tilgang til den underliggende <xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>objektet.</xref:System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest>

trans-unit.source: A type of <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> service to set the service provider to.
trans-unit.target: En type <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> service skal angis for leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no service is found.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen tjeneste.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the ASP.NET runtime should call <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the thread that is servicing this request when the request times out.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om ASP.NET-kjøring må kalle <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> på tråd som behandler forespørselen når forespørselen blir tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: In handlers and modules that are using the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.TimedOutToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to implement cooperative cancellation, you might wish to disable the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> behavior that ASP.NET performs by default when a request times out.
trans-unit.target: I behandlingsprogrammer og moduler som bruker den <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.TimedOutToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å implementere \\\Cooperative avbryte du vil deaktivere den <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Virkemåte ASP.NET utfører som standard når en forespørsel blir tidsavbrutt.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.TimedOutToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` can help you make sure that cancellation and cleanup routines will run without being interrupted by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes `false` kan hjelpe deg med å kontrollere at avbryte og opprydding for vil kjøre uten blir avbrutt av ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `false`, ASP.NET will not automatically display a "Request timed out" error page when a timeout occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til `false`, ASP.NET ikke vises automatisk en "Forespørselen ble tidsavbrutt" feilmeldingssiden når det oppstår et tidsavbrudd.

trans-unit.source: The application is responsible for setting the response content appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Programmet er ansvarlig for å angi innholdet som svar på riktig måte.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will be called when the thread times out; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> kalles når tråden ganger ut; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the initial timestamp of the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter det første tidsstempelet for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The timestamp returned from the Timestamp property is the local time of the server and is set during the instantiation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Tidsstempelet returnert fra egenskapen tidsstempel er lokal tid for serveren og er angitt under oppretting av den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>objektet.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The local time is equal to the UTC time plus the UTC offset.
trans-unit.target: Lokal tid er lik UTC-tid pluss UTC-forskyvning.

trans-unit.source: The timestamp of the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Tidsstempelet for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"> </xref> objekt for gjeldende HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"></xref> for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.TraceContext"> </xref> for gjeldende HTTP-svar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets security information for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sikkerhetsinformasjon for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The User property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for bruker gir programmatisk tilgang til egenskaper og metoder for den <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace (which contains the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class), you can reference the members of <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi ASP.NET-sider inneholder en standard referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområdet (som inneholder den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>klassen), kan du sjekke medlemmene i <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>et .aspx siden uten å bruke fullstendige klassereferansen til <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use `User.Identity.Name` to get the name of the user on whose behalf the current process is running.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke `User.Identity.Name` ikke hente navnet på brukeren på vegne den gjeldende prosessen kjører.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use the members of <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the <xref:System.Web> namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in <xref:System.Web> that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil bruke medlemmene av <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>fra en ASP.NET bakenforliggende kode modul, må du inkludere en referanse til det <xref:System.Web>navneområde i modulen og en fullstendig kvalifisert referanse til både aktive forespørsel/svar-konteksten og klassen i <xref:System.Web>som du vil bruke.</xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Web> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel på en side med bakenforliggende kode du må angi det fullstendige navnet `HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`.

trans-unit.source: Security information for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsinformasjon for den gjeldende HTTP-forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the negotiated protocol that was sent from the server to the client for an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> connection.
trans-unit.target: Henter den forhandlede protokollen som ble sendt fra serveren klienten for en <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"> </xref> tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The negotiated protocol.
trans-unit.target: Forhandlet protokollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ordered list of protocols requested by the client.
trans-unit.target: Henter i listen over protokoller som ble forespurt av klienten.

trans-unit.source: The requested protocols, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this is not an <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"></xref> request or if no list is present.
trans-unit.target: De forespurte protokollene eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis dette ikke er en <xref href="System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket"> </xref> forespørselen eller hvis det finnes ingen liste.
